content.raw: We are already calling [add_subdirectory(doc)](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/c149694d8102b0a7f821c22a0b2a1403db6ce92a/cmake/IgnCreateDocs.cmake?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#IgnCreateDocs.cmake-30) from the `ign_create_docs` macro, which is [called by ign_configure_build](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/c149694d8102b0a7f821c22a0b2a1403db6ce92a/cmake/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#IgnConfigureBuild.cmake-187). In order for downstream packages to set the `IGNITION_DOXYGEN_TAGFILES` variable, I think it's easier if it's a macro/function that takes that an argument?
content.html: We are already calling add_subdirectory(doc) from the ign_create_docs macro, which is called by ign_configure_build. In order for downstream packages to set the IGNITION_DOXYGEN_TAGFILES variable, I think it's easier if it's a macro/function that takes that an argument?
